interactables.name: Interactable Bookshelf
dialogue: This bookshelf contains information about fire spells.
You see a book titled How to Master the Fire Element (Without Burning Yourself).

interactables.name: Interactable Empty Bookshelf
dialogue: Dust has gathered on the shelves, signifying the lack of love this bookshelf has received.
A spider makes its way across the shelf above your head.
